devdoc.details: In order to distribute token rewards for an orange vault, the reward amounts need to be calculated for the vault depositors off- chain. The total reward amount should be sent to the distributor contract, either by calling pullNext for syk rewards or transferring the tokens directly to the distributor. A merkle root then needs to be  calculated based on the amount of tokens that are to be distributed to each vault depositor (this is performed off chain) and sent to the  distributor contract via updateMerkleRoot

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._amount: Amount of token to claim as reward
params._vault: The vault for which to claim rewards

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGauge(address,address).details: SYKPuller needs to be made the owner of the gauge, to allow pulling reward

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._token: The reward token for the vault
params._vault: The vault whose token is to be distributed using the merkle root

batchClaim(address[],address[],uint256[].notice: Claim multiple token rewards in a single call

canPullNext(address).notice: Check if the rewards for the next epoch can be pulled

claim(address,address,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claim all the token rewards for a vault

emergencyWithdrawal(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw funds in case of emergency

pullNext(address).notice: Pull the rewards for the next epoch from the gauge

setGauge(address,address).notice: Set the gauge for an orange vault

skipPulls(address,uint256).notice: Admin function to manually set the next epoch whose rewards will be pulled.

updateMerkleRoot(address,address,bytes32.notice: Update the merkle root for the reward token distribution of a vault

userdoc.notice: Contract for distributing token rewards to Orange vault depositors. The contract is able to distribute token rewards distributed by stryke via their gauges as well as any ERC20 token transferred to the OrangeDistributor contract
